column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We had an absolutely fantastic meal for brunch at Bosscat over the weekend.  The atmosphere was very trendy
column3: music was on.  We arrived just after 11 on Sunday
column4: and quickly got a seat.  By the time we left
column6: and a reservation would likely be nice
column7: although it does appear to have a fair amount of seating.
